treks.title: Annapurna Base Camp (ABC) Trek
treks.short_description: Trek to the base camp of Annapurna I (8,091m) through Modi Khola valley with spectacular mountain views, pristine forests, and direct views of Annapurna's north face and surrounding peaks.
treks.review_text: Spectacular trek with incredible close-up views of Annapurna and surrounding peaks. Less crowded than Everest Base Camp with equally stunning scenery.

hero_section.title: Annapurna Base Camp Trek
hero_section.subtitle: Base camp of Annapurna I - Stunning close-up mountain views at 4,130m

sections.heading: Annapurna Base Camp Trek Overview
articles: Annapurna Base Camp (4,130m) sits at the foot of Annapurna I (8,091m), one of the world's most beautiful and dangerous mountains. This 10-day trek follows the Modi Khola valley through lush rhododendron forests, alpine meadows, and offers stunning direct views of Annapurna's north face, Machhapuchhare, and surrounding peaks. The trek is relatively short but offers incredible mountain scenery and fewer crowds than popular Everest Base Camp trek. You'll stay in teahouses throughout with authentic mountain village experiences. The final push to ABC includes passing through pristine wilderness and glacial terrain.

bullets.text: Direct base camp of Annapurna I (8,091m)
Max altitude 4,130m - less extreme than Everest Base Camp

itinerary_days.title: Arrive Kathmandu
itinerary_days.description: Arrival in Kathmandu. Meet guide, prepare trekking gear, briefing and acclimatization.

itinerary_days.title: Drive Kathmandu to Pokhara, trek to Phedi
itinerary_days.description: Drive 200 km to Pokhara (6-7 hours). Trek from Pokhara to Phedi village starting Modi Khola valley.

itinerary_days.title: Trek Phedi to Dhampus
itinerary_days.description: Trek through rhododendron forests and terraced villages. First views of Annapurna and Machhapuchhare.

itinerary_days.title: Trek Dhampus to Landruk
itinerary_days.description: Trek through Gurung villages and agricultural lands. Gradual ascent through forests.

itinerary_days.title: Trek Landruk to Bhaglung
itinerary_days.description: Ascend through rhododendron and oak forests. High altitude forest views with mountain vistas.

itinerary_days.title: Trek Bhaglung to Chomrung
itinerary_days.description: Trek through dense forests and meadows. Approach Modi Khola valley. Spectacular mountain views emerging.

itinerary_days.title: Trek Chomrung to Deurali
itinerary_days.description: Trek along Modi Khola gorge through rhododendron forests. Continuous mountain views. Ascent to Deurali.

itinerary_days.title: Trek Deurali to Annapurna Base Camp
itinerary_days.description: Final ascent to ABC. Trek through alpine meadows and glacial terrain. Stunning direct views of Annapurna I north face and Modi Glacier.

itinerary_days.title: Rest day at ABC & Descent to Deurali
itinerary_days.description: Explore ABC area. Photography and acclimatization. Descend to Deurali for overnight.

itinerary_days.title: Trek Deurali to Phedi & Drive to Pokhara
itinerary_days.description: Descend to Phedi. Drive back to Pokhara. Trek completion celebration.

highlights.title: Annapurna Base Camp - Direct Mountain Views
highlights.description: Reach the base camp of Annapurna I (8,091m) with stunning direct views of the north face and Modi Glacier. Incredible mountaineering perspective.

highlights.title: Modi Khola Valley - Pristine Wilderness
highlights.description: Trek through the beautiful Modi Khola valley with lush rhododendron forests, alpine meadows, and glacier-fed streams.

highlights.title: Less Crowded Than EBC
highlights.description: Experience similar mountain beauty to Everest Base Camp but with significantly fewer trekkers and more authentic local interactions.

highlights.title: Machhapuchhare Close-up Views
highlights.description: See the sacred Fish Tail Mountain (Machhapuchhare) from multiple angles throughout the trek. One of the world's most beautiful peaks.

cost_and_date_section.intro_text: ABC Trek is best March-May (Spring) and September-November (Autumn). All prices per person vary by group size. Private departures available on request.

date_highlights.highlight: Autumn (Sept-Nov): Stable weather, crystal-clear mountain views

questions.question: Is ABC Trek suitable for beginners?
questions.answer: Yes, ABC Trek is moderately challenging. Previous trekking experience helpful but not mandatory. Max altitude is 4,130m which is lower than EBC.

questions.question: How many days is ABC Trek?
questions.answer: Total 10 days including arrival/departure days. Actual trekking is 6 days with gradual acclimatization.

gallery_images.title: Annapurna Base Camp
gallery_images.caption: Base camp with direct Annapurna I views

additional_info_sections.heading: Important Information
articles: ABC Trek is shorter and easier than EBC trek. Good for trekkers with limited time but wanting mountain experiences.
Modi Khola valley has reliable teahouse accommodations throughout the trek.
Autumn is peak season. Book in advance for better accommodations.

bullets.text: Moderate difficulty - suitable for most trekkers
Less crowded than popular Everest Base Camp
